page.title: 15Employment in our area
page.content: The main place of employment in the village of Silverdale is the N.C.B. Colliery,which gives jobs to some 860 men.There is a tile works,a brick works and an iron foundry.Belstaff Factory used to produce uniforms,but now makes rainwear and camping equipment.There is light industrial estate at Stonewall. The library,Health Centre and local shops provide other employment for the people of our village. Employment in Knutton is concentrated in two factories;these are Rists Ltd., and G.E.C.Rists manufacture electrical wiring systems and G.E.C. produce motors for all kinds of electrical goods. There is no source of employment in the village of Keele,but the University does provide jobs for a few villagers. Most people have jobs in Newcastle or the towns of the Potteries.
